code: export var BrandActionTypes={GET_LIST:"GET_LIST",GET_LIST_SUCCESS:"GET_LIST_SUCCESS",GET_LIST_ERROR:"GET_LIST_ERROR",GET_ACCESSORY:"GET_ACCESSORY",GET_ACCESSORY_SUCCESS:"GET_ACCESSORY_SUCCESS",GET_ACCESSORY_ERROR:"GET_ACCESSORY_ERROR",CLEAR_STATE:"CLEAR_STATE"};Object.keys(BrandActionTypes).forEach(function(key){BrandActionTypes[key]="BRAND_".concat(BrandActionTypes[key]);});var onClearState=function onClearState(){return{type:BrandActionTypes.CLEAR_STATE};};var onGetList=function onGetList(payload){return{type:BrandActionTypes.GET_LIST,payload:payload};};var onGetListSuccess=function onGetListSuccess(payload){return{type:BrandActionTypes.GET_LIST_SUCCESS,payload:payload};};var onGetListError=function onGetListError(error){return{type:BrandActionTypes.GET_LIST_ERROR,payload:error};};var onGetAccessory=function onGetAccessory(payload){return{type:BrandActionTypes.GET_ACCESSORY,payload:payload};};var onGetAccessorySuccess=function onGetAccessorySuccess(brands){return{type:BrandActionTypes.GET_ACCESSORY_SUCCESS,payload:{brands:brands}};};var onGetAccessoryError=function onGetAccessoryError(error){return{type:BrandActionTypes.GET_ACCESSORY_ERROR,payload:error};};var BrandActions={onClearState:onClearState,onGetList:onGetList,onGetListSuccess:onGetListSuccess,onGetListError:onGetListError,onGetAccessory:onGetAccessory,onGetAccessorySuccess:onGetAccessorySuccess,onGetAccessoryError:onGetAccessoryError};export default BrandActions;
